sorcer.service

Class Accessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.service.Accessor

  • public class Accessor
extends Object
    A service accessing facility that allows to find dynamically a network service provider matching its Signature. This class uses the Factory Method pattern with the DynamicAccessor interface.
    Author:
    Mike Sobolewski

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static Logger logger 
      static String providerName 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Accessor() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static DynamicAccessor getAccessor()
      Returns the current servicer accessor.
      static Service getServicer(Signature signature)
      Returns a servicer matching its Signature using the particular factory accessor of this service accessor facility.
      static ServiceItem getServicerItem(Signature signature)
      Returns a service item containing the servicer matching its Signature using the particular factory accessor of this service accessor facility.
      static void setAccessor(DynamicAccessor provider)
      Assigns the provider of service accessor (factory) that implements DynamicAccessor.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getServicer

        public static Service getServicer(Signature signature)
                           throws SignatureException
        Returns a servicer matching its Signature using the particular factory accessor of this service accessor facility.
        Parameters:
        signature - the signature of requested servicer
        Returns:
        the requested Service
        Throws:
        SignatureException

      • getServicerItem

        public static ServiceItem getServicerItem(Signature signature)
                                   throws SignatureException
        Returns a service item containing the servicer matching its Signature using the particular factory accessor of this service accessor facility.
        Parameters:
        signature - the signature of requested servicer
        Returns:
        the requested ServiceItem
        Throws:
        SignatureException

      • setAccessor

        public static void setAccessor(DynamicAccessor provider)
        Assigns the provider of service accessor (factory) that implements DynamicAccessor.
        Parameters:
        provider - the servicer accessor

      • getAccessor

        public static DynamicAccessor getAccessor()
        Returns the current servicer accessor.
        Returns:
        the servicer accessor
